content.question: In seventeenth-century western Europe, marriage patterns showed a tendency toward

choices.label: intermarriage between peasant families and noble families
romantic love as the major factor in choosing a spouse
non-noble women marrying much younger men
relatively late first marriages by non-noble women

content.answer: relatively late first marriages by non-noble women

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
